title: Fragment, mid–late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with supplementary weft
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Narrow fragment of "droguet" velvet, uncut pile. Cream-colored and green velvet pile with cream, yellow and red-orange silk showing through in tiny spots.
